Why this redirect exists — short reasoning

This repository currently serves as a temporary landing page while the full HouseLearning site (index.html and related gists) is being assembled. Rather than publishing an incomplete index, we redirect visitors to a simple explanatory page that:

  • Explains the current state of the project.
  • Describes what will come next and rough priorities.
  • Offers links so contributors and visitors can explore or get in touch.

Roadmap & next steps

  1. Finalize core pages (index, math, science, coding) and content structure.
  2. Publish interactive examples and guided challenges for learners.
  3. Collect feedback and iterate — contributors welcome via the About page.

If you'd like to contribute or follow progress, please visit the About page or the project repository links in the navigation.
